attributes.action: prevent the use of non geographical telephone numbers in the public service departments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Non geographical numbers are now being used as another form of tax.

Many telephone service providers include free calls or minutes to Geographical Numbers.

The ever increasing Premium Rate numbers are being used by the DVLA and other Government Service Departments directed at people who can least afford to dial them.
